name: Builder Settings
custom_server_script:
data.user = frappe.session.user
data.user_info = frappe.db.sql(f"""SELECT C.name as customer_id,U.full_name FROM `tabCustomers` C INNER JOIN `tabUser` U ON C.email=U.name WHERE U.name<>'Guest' AND U.name='{frappe.session.user}'""",as_dict=1)
data.user_name = data.user_info[0].get("full_name") if data.user_info else ""
data.customer_id = data.user_info[0].get("customer_id") if data.user_info else ""
data.cart_count = 0
data.wishlist_count = 0
data.cart_total_amount = 0
builder_doc = frappe.get_doc("Builder Data")
all_settings = builder_doc.get_all_settings()
data.settings = all_settings
data.cart_items = []
data.wishlist_items = []
if frappe.session.user!="Guest":
    cart_obj = builder_doc.get_customer_cart_items(data.customer_id)
    if cart_obj.get("cart"):
        data.cart_items = (cart_obj.get("cart").get("items"))
        for ct in cart_obj.get("cart").get("items"):
            data.cart_count = data.cart_count + ct.get("quantity")
        data.cart_total_amount = cart_obj.get("cart").get("formatted_total")

    if cart_obj.get("wishlist"):
        data.wishlist_items = (cart_obj.get("wishlist").get("items"))
        for ct in cart_obj.get("wishlist").get("items"):
            data.wishlist_count = data.wishlist_count + ct.get("quantity")
else:
    customer_id = frappe.request.cookies.get('customer_id')
    if customer_id:
        cart_obj = builder_doc.get_customer_cart_items(customer_id)
        if cart_obj.get("cart"):
            data.cart_items = (cart_obj.get("cart").get("items"))
            for ct in cart_obj.get("cart").get("items"):
                data.cart_count = data.cart_count + ct.get("quantity")
            data.cart_total_amount = cart_obj.get("cart").get("formatted_total")

        if cart_obj.get("wishlist"):
            data.wishlist_items = (cart_obj.get("wishlist").get("items"))
            for ct in cart_obj.get("wishlist").get("items"):
                data.wishlist_count = data.wishlist_count + ct.get("quantity")
data.categories = frappe.db.get_all("Product Category",
                   fields=[
                        "category_image",
                        "name",
                        "category_name",
                        "mobile_image",
                        "route"
                    ],
                    filters={"parent_product_category": "", "is_active": 1},
                    order_by="display_order")
if data.categories:
    for x in data.categories:
        x.child = frappe.get_all(
            "Product Category",
            fields=[
                "category_image",
                "name",
                "category_name",
                "mobile_image",
                "route"
            ],
            filters={"parent_product_category": x.name, "is_active": 1},
            order_by="display_order",
            )
        if x.child:
            for c in x.child:
                c.child = frappe.get_all(
                    "Product Category",
                    fields=[
                        "category_image",
                        "name",
                        "category_name",
                        "mobile_image",
                        "route"
                    ],
                    filters={"parent_product_category": c.name, "is_active": 1},
                    order_by="display_order",
                    )


frappe.log_error("wishlist_items",data.wishlist_items)
